data.title: Personal Information: Mohammed Anwar el Sadat (1918
data.meta_description: The Egyptian politician Mohammed Anwar el Sadat was an important dialogue partner for Willy Brandt concerning issues of the Middle East.
data.text:
The Egyptian president was always quick to smile or laugh. Extremely courteous in manner (…) I had to accept the fact that his public and semipublic utterances – especially his after-dinner speeches – sometimes strained the limits imposed on us by our conception of impartiality.

Willy Brandt, People and Politics, 1978, p. 479
